text: Kourtney Mary Kardashian (born April 18, 1979) is an American television personality and socialite who gained fame after appearing on her family's TV series Keeping Up with the Kardashians and multiple other TV shows. She is also a businesswoman and model. ==Early life == Kourtney Mary Kardashian was born in Los Angeles, California on April 18, 1979, to parents Robert and Kris. She is the oldest Kardashian siblings. She is the sister of Kim Kardashian, Khloé Kardashian, Rob Kardashian, Kendall Jenner, and Kylie Jenner. She is also the ex-stepsister of Burt Jenner, Cassandra Marino (née Jenner), Brandon Jenner, and Brody Jenner. == Personal life == She was in a relationship with Scott Disick from 2007 to July 2015. They have three children together: Mason, Penelope, and Reign. In early 2021 Kardashian has been in a relationship with Travis Barker, a musician. In the late 2021, Barker proposed to Kardashian and the got engaged in California. The two were married in May 2022. On November 1, 2023, she gave birth to their son, Rocky Thirteen Barker. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Models from Los Angeles Category:American television actors Category:American television personalities Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American company founders Category:Kardashian family
title: Kourtney Kardashian
